title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Whitepoint Africa Studio and Film Academy

description.narrative: Whitepoint Africa Studio and Film Academy projects give birth to a commercial company that will offer a combination of international standard education for students and high-end commercial studio services for local and regional film tv + advertising indust ries. Both departments work separately but use each others resources like staff facilities computers etc.The Academy will offer curriculum specifically designed for the needs of the market covering all essential areas of film making from creative writing a nd concept design to online mastering. Students can select from full courses or single modules of topics of their interest if they already master some areas. Education is provided by local teachers visiting local + international lecturers mentoring by comm ercial studio professionals and through apprenticeship. Ideally students will be hired by the Studio or the Academy as the long term goal is to grow locally and internationally.The commercial studio will offer high-end services for clients that are very li mited at the moment in the region saving them travel time money + lowering their carbon footprint. Many of the clients will be from the booming film industry tv and advertising. The studio will also target international production companies operating in th e region. The project helps to generate more new professional jobs in the region immaterial exports through improving technical level of deliverables and keeping resources more effectively in the region. The model is scalable and our goal is to export it a ll across the continent and the rest of the developing world.
